definitions: The action of discharging a firearm or other weapon.
The action of dismissing an employee from a job.
The action of heating something to a high temperature, especially in a kiln.
The action of igniting or causing to ignite.
examples: The firing of the cannon echoed through the valley.
The company announced the firing of several executives.
The artist was overseeing the firing of the pottery.
The firing of the engine was delayed due to a fault.
